name: Pop Rings: Color Puzzle Game
description:
An easy-to-learn but challenging puzzle is waiting for tic-tac-toe lovers. Drag rings into position or even on top of each other - enter the 3rd dimension! The further you get the more colors appear and you'll climb the rankings against your friends. Pro Tip: Consecutive blasts of matching three in a row will activate score multipliers!

Have fun in this beautiful and intuitive puzzle of color circle and stacks. One spot can stack up to 3 rings in different sizes and colors. Form a line – horizontally, vertically or diagonally – or a full stack with 3 same color rings and BLOW!!! They will explode and push you up in the scoreboard!

It’s simple at the beginning, but getting high scores is harder than you think. Challenge your friends to beat your score and compete to become the World Master of the Rings.

Features:
* 100% free game to play
* Style interface
* Smooth touch control
* Good mind exercise
* IAP: unlimited boosters, 2X Score, Free-Ads, Offline play

Are you ready for this addictive endless game?
